name: Sally's Salon - Beauty Secrets
description:
Looking for a new hairdo? Want to get your nails done? Need some special make up? There's no better place in Snuggford than Sally’s Salon!

Everyone’s favorite beautician Sally returns, on a mission to beautify women across the globe - all while searching for her long lost love! Ready to join her (and her new side-kick François!) on this hilarious journey?

- BECOME AN AMAZING BEAUTICIAN and go on a hair-raising adventure like never before
- PLAY 60 TIME MANAGEMENT LEVELS, and 18 extra bonus levels, as you run unique salons across 6 exotic chapters
- HELP SALLY PERFORM BEAUTY TREATMENTS as you search for the famous singer, Julio, Sally's long lost love
- DISCOVER 12 MINI-GAMES and improve your beautician skills as you cut hair, apply face masks and match make up
- MEET SALLY'S SIDEKICK FRANCOIS - hilarious, clumsy, and a familiar face from the Delicious Emily hit series
- IMPROVE YOUR SALONS and reward yourself with special upgrades and products
- ENJOY MANY GUEST APPEARANCES from stars of the other GameHouse Original Stories
- COLLECT ALL THE TROPHIES to discover special beauty items, and earn all the diamonds to reveal Sally's memories of Julio

Guess who's back!?

Business is booming, and Sally and her new side-kick François are making the town a little more beautiful, one treatment at a time. At least, they were - until some breaking news left Sally bursting with excitement!

Turns out her favorite singer and long-time crush Julio will be performing his farewell concert near Snuggford! As one of his biggest fans, Sally couldn't be more thrilled. But there's more. What nobody knows is that Julio and Sally had a summer romance 20 years ago!

Just when Sally's convinced they’ll be able to rekindle their romance... Disaster strikes! Julio's plane goes missing on its way to the concert. Determined to find him, Sally and François set off on an incredible search!

Will Sally find her long lost love? Fix your hair up pretty, put some make up on, pack your nicest dress, and get ready to find out in this hair-curling time management adventure!
